column5: Great stuff Ben.  I'm gonna miss getting up there this year but next fall it will happen.
Very cool video thanks for sharing!
Good vid Ben. Still at Moosehorn?

Gray work Ben Love the shot where your lifting the first fish out of the net ....  The size of the head on that beast.  WOW.  I have to ask, what kind of a net are you using there.  Looks nice and big to handed those fish ??
very cool Ben thanks for taking the time to put that together I know it takes a lot of time to do it.
Great video...loved the tune as well. Thanks
This has been watched more than once.

Thanks gang.  Simon - hope to see you on the ice this winter.  We need to get caught up and catch some fish together again.  Rich - The net I own is a beckman Pen FinSaver.  It's the one with the green hoop.  There's also a Frabill Big Kahoona in the video.  Both work well and are probably the most important release tool you can have.
Great vid especially the one at 3:17  Soo pumped to go to LSC in a few weeks
Great video.  Provided a really nice mental escape from the office this afternoon.

I had to go back and see which one you were talking about.  That fish at 3:17 is the only hit I've got on camera... and it was  a F8 fish no less!  That was near the end of a tough day.  The kid who caught it was ready to pack up and go in but I talked him into another spot or 2.  Glad I did.  I completely missed the boat side jump after he hooked it as I turned for the net.  It's never easy, but it's always exciting.  Good luck at LSC!
Great vid and love that band. Trampled by turtles.
Great vid and love that band. Trampled by turtles. Turtles are solid!  Had you heard of them before my video?  Not many have.  They are from Duluth.
I discovered them earlier this summer by chance on youtube and bought two of their albums. Nice vid.
Very cool!  Really liked the sound track too
